title: Fucking hotfix ARAM already
body:
All the visual effects are completely bugged to the point it's gamebreaking
You can't see when ennemies use the dash summoner spell
Why the fuck isn't it hotfixed already

replies.body:
We are working on this issue, but we haven't actually been able to pinpoint a root cause, so we have no fix to hotfix yet :( 

Sorry for the bug, I know it super sucks. I play a lot of ARAM and it's miserable right now, but we're working on it!
ALL DASHES ARE BROKEN ON ALL MAPS! It's not just ARAM.

Do you have videos of it being broken on other Maps?

We haven't been able to reproduce the issue on other maps internally (minus apparently Talon, but I actually think that's a separate bug T_T)

If you have videos of it broken on SR or TT, that would be super super helpful!
Let me dash my claws over u lol {{champion:19}}

this is not only in aram, it is all gamemodes

it was listed in this post 

(https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/EZF2Vpx4-patch-814-all-bugs)

so its not a wonder that they are even to brainafk for fix some important things.
